basic.Source: Synthetic construct after SLAY screening and prediction
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.29307492] Gram-negative bacteria:E. coli W3110 (MBC = 128 μM), Acinetobacter baumannii 5075 (MBC > 128 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa 14 (MBC = 128 μM), E. coli conferring New Delhi metallo-beta-lactamase (MBC > 128 μM).
